description: Like other European countries, France will see muted celebrations to mark the last night of the year.
title: Covid: France mobilises 100,000 police to stop New Year's Eve gatherings
title_page: Covid: France mobilises 100,000 police to stop New Year's Eve gatherings - BBC News
maintext: The whole of mainland Scotland has been under level four - the top tier of measures - since 26 December and will remain there for at least three weeks. People have been urged to remain at home on New Year's Eve.
